author: Nintendo of America
description:
Little Nightmares III demo is now available on Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/little-nightmares-iii-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01  

Little Ones, in the desert awaits ruins that hold terrifying obstacles and secrets. Are you ready to face them head on? 

#LittleNightmaresIII #NintendoSwitch #NintendoSwitch2
